alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Comanche, southwestern Grady, southeastern Caddo, northwestern Stephens and northern Cotton Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Cyril to 5 miles east of Lawton to 3 miles southeast of Indiahoma. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawton, Duncan, Marlow, Walters, Cache, Elgin, Geronimo, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Medicine Park, Indiahoma, Faxon, Fort Sill, Lake Ellsworth, Lake Lawtonka, Central High and Empire City. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 17 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
